doc.title: Incamake y'ihuriro ryuguruye n'ukwaguka
doc.description:
Iyi nzira ishobora kugufasha kugenzura neza ingene amahuza afungurwa.

Idirisha: izindi nzira, amadirisho asohoka, amadirisho mashasha, amadirisho mashasha y'ibanga, idirisha ririho ubu (mburabuzi)

Ibipande: ibubamfu bw'ibipande biriho, ibipande biriho, iburyo bw'ibipande biriho (ivya kera)

Ikibanza co gukoresha: ntibikora, bikoreshe ubwo nyene (ivya kera)
